mdRecord.dcterms:title: The law-dictionary: explaining the rise, progress, and present state, of the English law, in theory and practice; defining and interpreting the terms or words of art; and comprising copious information, historical, political, and commercial, on the subjects of our law, trade, and government / Originally comp. by Giles Jacob; and continued by him, and other editors, through ten editions: now greatly enl. and improved, by many material corrections and additions .. by T. E. Tomlins
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jacob, Giles, 1686-1744
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed by A. Strahan, for T. Longman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: LAW: Vol. 2, copy 2: T.p. and first [6] p. missing.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Law--Great Britain--Dictionaries
